Download drivers for Frankfurt RS-232

You can use the Frankfurt RS-232 with your own code either by writing code for the CAN4VSCP serial driver which expose a CANAL interface (AKA Level I interface) or written directly to interface one of the modes of the Frankfurt RS-232 module (verbose, CAN4VSCP or SLCAN).

The CAN4VSCP is included in the VSCP & Friends package.
